title: This is java
content: You can control the values of more than one input field by adding a name attribute to each element. We will initialize our state with an empty object. To access the fields in the event handler use the event.target.name and event.target.value syntax.

title: This is React
content: You can control the values of more than one input field by adding a name attribute to each element. We will initialize our state with an empty object. To access the fields in the event handler use the event.target.name and event.target.value syntax.
